設定範囲: (せっていはんい) - range of values
設立: (せつりつ) - establishment; founding; incorporation (of a business)
設置: (setchi) - estabelecimento, instituição; instalação (de uma máquina ou equipamento)
設置条件: (せっちじょうけん) - installation requirement
設計変更: (せっけいへんこう) - design change; engineering change
設計明細書: (せっけいめいさいしょ) - project specifications; specs
許し: (ばっかし) - approximately/about; only/nothing but; (after the -ta form of a verb)  just (finished, etc.)
許しがたい: (ゆるしがたい) - hard-to-forgive; intolerable; inexcusable; unpardonable
許し色: (ゆるしいろ) - permitted colour (for courtiers' clothing)
許し難い: (ゆるしがたい) - hard-to-forgive; intolerable; inexcusable; unpardonable
許す: (ゆるす) - to permit/to allow/to approve/to tolerate; to exempt (from fine)/to excuse (from)/to pardon/to forgive/to release/to let off; to confide in; to give up/to yield
許すまじ: (ゆるすまじ) - to be unforgivable; to never forgive something
許り: (ばっかり) - only/merely/nothing but/no more than; approximately/about; (after the -ta form of a verb) just (finished, etc.); (after an attributive form or auxiliary verb ぬ(ん), also often …とばかり(に))  as if to/(as though) about to; (in the form …とばかり or …とばかりに) indicates emphasis; always/constantly
許りが能ではない: (ばかりがのうではない) - It is not everything to
許りでなく: (ばかりでなく) - not only ... but (also); as well as ...
許りに: (ばかりに) - (simply) because/on account of; as if
許可: (kyoka) - permissão, aprovação, autorização, licença; permitir, autorizar
許可された人: (きょかされたひと) - admittee; licensee
許可を与える: (きょかをあたえる) - to grant permission; to give permission
許可制: (きょかせい) - license system; licence system
許可抗告: (きょかこうこく) - {law} appeal by permission; permitted appeal; permitted complaint
許可証: (きょかしょう) - permit; license; licence
許容差: (きょようさ) - allowable difference; tolerance; leeway
許容情報速度: (きょようじょうほうそくど) - allowable information rate
許容範囲: (きょようはんい) - tolerance level; permissible range; acceptable limits
許容線量: (きょようせんりょう) - maximum permissible dose
許容誤差: (きょようごさ) - allowable error; allowable limit of error
許容量: (きょようりょう) - maximum permissible level or dosage
許認可: (きょにんか) - approval and authorization; permits and licences
許認可権: (きょにんかけん) - (yoji) ministerial authority to grant permits and approvals
許諾契約: (きょだくけいやく) - license agreement
訳: (yaku/despertar) - translate , conclusion from reasoning, judgement or calculation based on something read or heard, reason, cause, meaning, circumstances, situation
訳あり: (わけあり) - (having) special circumstances (e.g. problems, issues, advantages, flaws, defects, etc.)
訳ありげ: (わけありげ) - seeming to have a problem, issue, etc.
訳あり商品: (わけありしょうひん) - imperfect product
訳あり気: (わけありげ) - seeming to have a problem, issue, etc.
訳がある: (わけがある) - to have a reason; to have an excuse
訳がない: (わけがない) - there is no way that ... (expresses speaker's belief that something is impossible); easy/simple
訳がわからない: (わけがわからない) - incomprehensible; uncomprehending
訳が分からない: (わけがわからない) - incomprehensible; uncomprehending
訳が分らない: (わけがわからない) - incomprehensible; uncomprehending
訳が無い: (わけがない) - there is no way that ... (expresses speaker's belief that something is impossible); easy/simple
訳が違う: (わけがちがう) - to be incomparable; to be completely different matters; to be completely different things
訳しにくい: (やくしにくい) - difficult to translate; untranslatable
訳し難い: (やくしがたい) - difficult to translate; untranslatable
訳じゃない: (わけじゃない) - it does not mean that ...; I don't mean that ...; it is not the case that
訳する: (やくする) - to translate; to interpret
訳ではない: (わけではない) - it does not mean that ...; I don't mean that ...; it is not the case that...
訳では無い: (わけではない) - it does not mean that ...; I don't mean that ...; it is not the case that...
訳ない: (わけない) - easy/simple; (contraction of 訳が無い) (there is) no reason
訳にはいかない: (わけにはいかない) - impossible to do (although wants to); cannot afford to; must not; no way we can
訳にはいきません: (わけにはいきません) - impossible to do (although wants to)
訳にはいけない: (わけにはいけない) - (incorrect variant of 訳にはいかない)  impossible to do (although wants to); cannot afford to; must not; no way we can
訳には行かない: (わけにはいかない) - impossible to do (although wants to); cannot afford to; must not; no way we can
訳のわからない: (わけのわからない) - incomprehensible; uncomprehending
訳の分かった人: (わけのわかったひと) - sensible man
訳の分からない: (わけのわからない) - incomprehensible; uncomprehending
訳の分からない言葉: (わけのわからないことば) - meaningless words; words that make no sense
訳の分らない: (わけのわからない) - incomprehensible; uncomprehending
訳もなく: (わけもなく) - without cause; without reason
訳も無く: (わけもなく) - without cause; without reason
訳名: (やくめい) - name or word formed by translation
訳文: (やくぶん) - a translation; translated sentence
訳有り: (わけあり) - (having) special circumstances (e.g. problems, issues, advantages, flaws, defects, etc.)
訳有りげ: (わけありげ) - seeming to have a problem, issue, etc.
訳有り商品: (わけありしょうひん) - imperfect product
訳有り気: (わけありげ) - seeming to have a problem, issue, etc.
訳注: (やくちゅう) - translation with notes; translator's notes
訳無い: (わけない) - easy/simple; (contraction of 訳が無い) (there is) no reason
訳知り: (わけしり) - man of the world; experienced in matters of the heart
訳知り顔: (わけしりがお) - know-it-all airs; I-know-how-it-is look
